comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Since this at the same location as some photos of dog owners following this in the stream, it is presumably the James Mortimer who was a dog judge and was superintendent of the Westminster Kennel Club show in New York for some years. His death is reported by the NYT on September 21, 1915. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A05EEDF1239E333A...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Mortimer_(dogshow)
